title: Bug 123036 - Duplicate Data Storage Issue in Reports
description: This bug report is regarding a data duplication problem in reports. Data is stored redundantly, and the content stream may contain instances that should be excluded.
OB: The observed behavior is that an instance stored in the content stream is present when it should not be there.
EB: The expected behavior is that the instance stored by the content stream is not present, ensuring that data is not duplicated in reports.
SR:
To reproduce this bug:
1. Generate or access a report.
2. Observe that the instance stored by the content stream is incorrectly included in the report.
